common.User Tutorial: ユーザ用チュートリアル
common.Moderator Tutorial: モデレータ用チュートリアル
common.Welcome to use Divine Bridge Heres a qui: Divine Bridge のご利用ありがとうございます！始める前に、簡単なチュートリアルをご用意しました。
common.The server moderators must have added a: サーバのモデレータは、サーバにメンバーシップロールを追加しておく必要があります。もし、あなたがモデレータであれば、**モデレータ用チュートリアル**を確認して、メンバーシップロールの追加方法を確認できます。
common.Screenshot Mode: スクリーンショットモード
common.You need to sign in with YouTube and ver: YouTube にサインインして、メンバーシップを一度確認する必要があります。
common.You need to verify your membership every: 毎月、メンバーシップの確認が必要です。
common.and click the Sign in button and sign in: にある「サインイン」ボタンを押して、Discord アカウントでサインインしてください。
common.and click the Apply button of the member: にある「適用」ボタンを押して、ご希望のメンバーシップロールを適用してください。
common.Click the Sign in with Google button and: 「Googleでサインイン」ボタンを押して、YouTube アカウントを連携してください。
common.Click the Verify button to verify your m: 「確認」ボタンを押して、メンバーシップを確認します。
common.Once you are verified: 一度メンバーシップが確認されたあとは、
common.you dont have to do this again every mon: 毎月この作業を実行する必要はありません。
common.Divine Bridge will automatically renew y: Divine Bridge が、メンバーシップの有効期限を自動で確認します。
common.You are strongly recommended to learn mo: You are strongly recommended to learn more about this in the "Why Divine Bridge" section on the
common.command in the server where you want to: command in the server where you want to apply the membership role.
common.when you use the alias command you dont: . When you use the alias command, you don't have to specify the membership role you want to verify anymore.
common.Here are the alias commands in this serv: こちらが、このサーバ内のエイリアスコマンドです:
common.to view the alias commands in a server: を選択して、このサーバ内のエイリアスコマンドを確認できます。
common.The screenshot should include the follow: The screenshot should include the following information:
common.The YouTube channel name of the membersh: The YouTube channel name of the membership
common.Submit your verification request and wai: Submit your verification request and wait for moderators approval.
common.Server moderators will receive your memb: Server moderators will receive your membership verification request. Once approved, Divine Bridge will assign the membership role to you and notify you.
common.Every month 1 day before the expiry of y: Every month, 1 day before the expiry of your membership, Divine Bridge will notify you that you need to send a screenshot of your new billing date, you have
common.Moderator Commands: モデレータ用コマンド
common.Server Alias Commands: サーバエイリアスコマンド
common.Here are the commands you can use with D: こちらが Divine Bridge で利用できるコマンドです:
common.command to set the log channel for Divin: command to set the log channel for Divine Bridge.
common.Please make sure that the log channel is: Please make sure that the log channel is a private channel, only accessible by server moderators.
common.Note that the bot requires to view the l: Note that the bot requires to view the log channel, send messages, and embed links.
common.command to add a YouTube membership role: command to add a YouTube membership role to the server.
common.You need to create a Discord role first: You need to create a Discord role first in the server.
common.Besides the highest role of the bot must: Besides, the highest role of the bot must be
common.than the membership role in the role hie: than the membership role in the role hierarchy,
common.in order to manage the membership role: in order to manage the membership role.
common.This is a command name that users can us: This is a command name that users can use to verify their membership easier.
common.When using the alias command the corresp: When using the alias command, the corresponding membership role will be automatically selected, and the user will not need to select the membership role they want to verify again.
common.Handle the membership verification reque: Handle the membership verification requests in the log channel.
common.the bot will send a message to the: the bot will send a message to the

web.YouTube Channel Membership: YouTube チャンネル メンバーシップ
web.Divine Bridge is a Discord bot verifying: Divine Bridge は、ユーザが特定の YouTube チャンネルのメンバーシップを持っているかを確認し、それを Discord サーバ内のロールと紐づけるための Discord bot です。
web.It currently supports: 現在、次のモードをサポートしています：
web.page on YouTube: ページのスクリーンショットを送ってください。
web.Optical Character Recognition: Optical Character Recognition - 光学文字認識
web.to recognize the next billing date: ) を用いて、スクリーンショットから次回請求日を認識したのち、
web.and send your screenshot with the recogn: 認識したデータとスクリーンショットをサーバのモデレータに送り、手動で承認されます。
web.Divine Bridge will securely store your a: Divine Bridge は、認証されたOAuth認証情報を安全に保存し、定期的に YouTube API を用いてメンバーシップを自動的に確認します。
web.Why Divine Bridge: なぜ Divine Bridge なのか？
web.came from: のアイデアは、次のbotから得ています:
web.Both verification methods have pros and: どちらのメンバーシップ確認方法も一長一短です。
web.screenshot_mode_pros_and_cons: は自動化されておらず、メンバーシップに加入している証明を毎月送る必要があります。スクリーンショットには、個人情報や支払い明細などの機密情報が含まれている可能性があります。さらに、サーバのモデレータは全員の確認リクエストをチェックする必要があるため、長期的な観点からすると、やはり大きな負担がかかります。
web.auth_mode_pros_and_cons_1: は自動化されていますが、アプリに対して、but it requires you to authorize the App to
web.google_oauth_youtube_force_ssl_permissio: あなたのYouTube動画、レーティング、コメント、キャプションを閲覧、編集、永久削除する

web.meta_description: Divine Bridge is a Discord bot verifying YouTube channel memberships and link them with Discord server roles. It currently supports Screenshot Mode and Auth Mode.

help_command.name: help
help_command.description: Show you a tutorial to use Divine Bridge and all avaiable commands.

docs.user-tutorial:
Welcome to use Divine Bridge! Here's a quick tutorial to get you started.

<u>**Prerequisites**</u>

The server moderators must have added a membership role in the server. If you are a server moderator, you can view the **Moderator Tutorial** to learn how to add a membership role.

<u>**Auth Mode**</u>

> You need to verify your membership every month.

1. Go to Divine Bridge's [website](https://divine-bridge.jerrycool123.com/) and click the "Sign in" button and sign in with your Discord account.

2. Go to the [dashboard](https://divine-bridge.jerrycool123.com/dashboard) and click the "Apply" button of the membership role yo u would like to apply.

3. Click the "Sign in with Google" button and link your YouTube account.

4. Click the "Verify" button to verify your membership.

📝 **Important Note**

Once you are verified, you don't have to do this again every month.
Divine Bridge will automatically renew your membership duration.

This mode involves some <u>cyber security & privacy</u> concern.
**You are strongly recommended to learn more about this in the "Why Divine Bridge" section on the [website](https://divine-bridge.jerrycool123.com/).**

<u>**Screenshot Mode**</u>

> You need to sign in with YouTube and verify your membership once.

1. Please use `/verify` command in the server where you want to apply the membership role.

⭐️ **[Recommended]** Each membership role has a Alias Command. When you use the alias command, you don't have to specify the membership role you want to verify anymore.
You can use `/help` command and select `Command List` to view the alias commands in a server.

2. Go to [Purchases and Memberships](https://www.youtube.com/paid_memberships) and take a screenshot.

The screenshot should include the following information:
- The YouTube channel name of the membership
- Your name
- The next billing date

3. Submit your verification request and wait for moderators approval.

Server moderators will receive your membership verification request. Once approved, Divine Bridge will assign the membership role to you and notify you.

📝 **Important Note**

Every month, <u>1 day</u> before the expiry of your membership, Divine Bridge will notify you that you need to send a screenshot of your new billing date, you have <u>48 Hours</u> to do so.
docs.moderator-tutorial:
Welcome to use Divine Bridge! Here's a quick tutorial to get you started.

<u>**Prerequisites**</u>

You need to [invite Divine Bridge](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1243444258820853783&permissions=268435456&scope=bot+applications.commands) to your Discord server.
You need to have the **Manage Roles** permission in the server.

<u>**Steps**</u>

1. Use `/set-log-channel` command to set the log channel for Divine Bridge.

Please make sure that the log channel is a private channel, only accessible by server moderators.

Note that the bot requires to view the log channel, send messages, and embed links.

2. Use `/add-role` command to add a YouTube membership role to the server.

You need to create a Discord role first in the server. Besides, the highest role of the bot must be **higher** than the membership role in the role hierarchy, in order to manage the membership role.

You need to provide an **alias command** name for the membership role. This is a command name that users can use to verify their membership easier. When using the alias command, the corresponding membership role will be automatically selected, and the user will not need to select the membership role they want to verify again.

3. Handle the membership verification requests in the log channel.

When a user uses the **Screenshot Mode** to verify their membership, the bot will send a message to the⁠ server's log channel.

You can **Approve** ✅, **Reject** ❌, or **Modify** 📝 the verification request.
